meanings.sent1: The cryptogamous ferns in the forest thrive in the shade.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the cryptogamous plants found in the hidden garden.
meanings.sent3: The cryptogamous mushrooms seemed to play hide and seek with the botanist.
meanings.sent4: The cryptogamous world beneath the surface held secrets waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The cryptogamous nature of the mosses added an air of mystery to the landscape.

meanings.definition: Producing spores but not flowers or seeds.
meanings.sent1: The cryptogamous mosses spread their spores across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: In the dark, damp corners of the cave, cryptogamous fungi thrived.
meanings.sent3: The cryptogamous ferns were the envy of the flowerless garden.
meanings.sent4: The cryptogamous plants whispered secrets of survival without blooms.
meanings.sent5: The cryptogamous nature of the mushrooms fascinated the curious explorer.

meanings.definition: A plant that reproduces by spores.
meanings.sent1: The cryptogamous in the botanical garden released spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: The cryptogamous near the stream provided a lush green carpet.
meanings.sent3: The cryptogamous seemed to dance in the breeze, spreading spores joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The cryptogamous stood tall, proud of their spore-producing abilities.
meanings.sent5: The cryptogamous added a touch of magic to the forest with their spore-filled presence.
